data.answer: Information Technology (IT) is a Great industry.  Several displines make up IT like Network Administration, Software Development, DevOps, and Data Administration to name some.
Software development refers to a set of computer science activities dedicated to the process of creating, designing, deploying and supporting software.
Network administrators are responsible for installing, maintaining and upgrading any software or hardware required to efficiently run a computer network
DevOps is the combination of practices and tools designed to increase an organization's ability to deliver applications and services faster than traditional software development processes.
Database administration is the function of managing and maintaining database management systems (DBMS) software.
